name: PHASEDucker
desc: An object that manages competing sounds.

items.name: init(engine: PHASEEngine, sourceGroups: Set<PHASEGroup>, targetGroups: Set<PHASEGroup>, gain: Double, attackTime: Double, releaseTime: Double, attackCurve: PHASECurveType, releaseCurve: PHASECurveType)
items.desc: Creates an object that manages competing sounds.

items.name: var sourceGroups: Set<PHASEGroup>
items.desc: The sounds that determine volume reduction.

items.name: var targetGroups: Set<PHASEGroup>
items.desc: The sounds that reduce in volume.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: A unique value for the ducker.

items.name: var isActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the ducker reduces sound.

items.name: var attackTime: Double
items.desc: The amount of time for sound reduction to reach maximum strength.

items.name: var attackCurve: PHASECurveType
items.desc: A mathematical curve that shapes transition progress as sound reduction begins.

items.name: var releaseTime: Double
items.desc: The amount of time to transition from maximum sound reduction to no reduction.

items.name: var releaseCurve: PHASECurveType
items.desc: A mathematical curve that shapes transition progress as sound reduction ends.

items.name: func activate()
items.desc: Instructs the ducker to begin altering sound.

items.name: func deactivate()
items.desc: Stops the ducker from altering sound.
